channel.title: Comments on: Quick Bread – Daring Bakers Challenge February 2012

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great job! Your quick bread looks amazingly perfect! I love the dripping glaze! I would eat half (or all) of this myself, too! :)
item.content:encoded: Great job! Your quick bread looks amazingly perfect! I love the dripping glaze! I would eat half (or all) of this myself, too! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: I love the glaze dripping down the side of your loaf! Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: I love the glaze dripping down the side of your loaf! Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Very nice accompaniment to the picnic and music. May I suggest some sultanas or other dried fruit?
item.content:encoded: Very nice accompaniment to the picnic and music. May I suggest some sultanas or other dried fruit?

item.title: By: Carol Anne @ Rock Salt
item.dc:creator: Carol Anne @ Rock Salt
item.description: There is something so very inviting about a loaf shape - the phrase 'just one more slice' comes out of my mouth a bit too often!
item.content:encoded: There is something so very inviting about a loaf shape – the phrase ‘just one more slice’ comes out of my mouth a bit too often!

item.title: By: thelittleloaf
item.dc:creator: thelittleloaf
item.description: This looks simple and delicious - it's hard to beat a beautiful glazed loaf :-)
item.content:encoded: This looks simple and delicious – it’s hard to beat a beautiful glazed loaf ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Daisy@Nevertoosweet
item.dc:creator: Daisy@Nevertoosweet
item.description: I love this! It's so great that you share recipes about quick bread! I've never really had the courage to make bread at home but now looking at this recipe I guess it really isn't that difficult! thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded: I love this! It’s so great that you share recipes about quick bread! I’ve never really had the courage to make bread at home but now looking at this recipe I guess it really isn’t that difficult! thanks for sharing!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Looks fabulous! I skipped the glaze on mine, but it looks really good with the glaze. :)
item.content:encoded: Looks fabulous! I skipped the glaze on mine, but it looks really good with the glaze. ðŸ™‚
